items.sentence: Tom was unable to understand anything Mary said.
Tom was unwilling to do what we asked him to do.
Please let us know if we can help in other ways.
Quite a few people were invited to the ceremony.
Tom didn\'t tell anyone what he was about to do.
Tom doesn\'t know that Mary is in love with him.
Tom tried to convince Mary to go dance with him.
Tom turned on the desk lamp and started working.
Tom was drinking chocolate milk through a straw.
I didn\'t know something like this could happen.
